item.title: Comment on Venezuela under “Brutal Capitalism” by The Good Bill
item.description:
Reply to Sean:

First comment is "it wasn't real socialism!" Amazing.

>The NYTimes has lost touch with reality.

Mother of God, Alex. At what time, in your mind, did the NYT ever have ANY "touch with reality"??

It's a DNC Socialist House Organ. It has always been a DNC Socialist House Organ.

Congrats, I guess, for finally noticing. Not that this realization will help you in any way whatsoever. You will keep going to it for "news," and you will keep linking to it. And you will keep voting Democrat.

item.dc:creator: The Good Bill

item.title: Comment on Venezuela under “Brutal Capitalism” by The Good Bill
item.description:
Reply to dan1111:

I have read plenty from the NYT, and while they have always had a significant bias, this article does feel like a "jumped the shark" moment.

Does it, though?

The NYT told you Trump was a Russian spy based on a document Hillary paid for... they told you Hunter's laptop was planted by Russians, so you need to ignore all the evidence of the Biden family's crimes on it... they routinely copy+paste "news" from (God help us) the Gaza Health Ministry as if it were incontrovertible fact... and as recently as three weeks ago they were insisting Joe Biden was "sharp as a tack."

But now that they've minimized Maduro's interest in socialism, it "feels like a jumped the shark moment"? Seriously?
